translation.zh: 我们还是先别担心这件事吧

translation.en: You know, it's deliciously exhilarating engaging in all this skulduggery.
translation.zh: 话说做这种偷龙转凤的勾当 令人又兴奋又疲倦

translation.en: -[laughs] Come on. -Ah.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: That wasn't supposed to happen.
translation.zh: 不应该会发生这种事的

translation.en: Hey. What's that?
translation.zh: 那是什么状况？

translation.en: It's a sensor in the gallery.
translation.zh: 是艺廊的感应器被触动的

translation.en: Something's happening. I think it's an alarm.
translation.zh: 出事了 好像是触动了警铃

translation.en: -Well, sort it out then! -I don't know what to do!
translation.zh: -那就赶紧解决啊 -我不知道怎么解决

translation.en: -Use the laptop! Turn it off and on again. -I don't think that's gonna work!
translation.zh: -关掉笔电 重新开启 -我不觉得行得通

translation.en: [Reggie] Google it!
translation.zh: 赶紧问谷歌大神

translation.en: Take this.
translation.zh: 拿着

translation.en: Hold on. It stopped.
translation.zh: 等等 停下来了

translation.en: For now, but the jig is up. You got to get out of there.
translation.zh: 暂时的 但事情败露了 你赶紧离开现场吧

translation.en: -Maybe the music's vibration set it off. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -可能受到音乐震动影响吧 -没错

translation.en: Psst! Frank! Mayday, Frank. Mayday! Abort the mission.
translation.zh: 弗兰克 出大事了 终止任务！

translation.en: -What? -Get in the van!
translation.zh: -什么？ -快上车吧

translation.en: What about Fiona and Peter?
translation.zh: 那菲欧娜和彼得怎么办？

translation.en: Me and Frankie boy, we're getting out while the getting's good.
translation.zh: 趁还来得及 我和弗兰克先走一步了

translation.en: I ain't ending up six foot under.
translation.zh: 我还想活下去

translation.en: Okay, I'm coming.
translation.zh: 好的 我出来了

translation.en: Oh God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: Stay here.
translation.zh: 别走开

translation.en: Oh. But… but… I've… I've cooled off now.
translation.zh: 等一下 我已经不热了

translation.en: -I'll only be a minute. -[exhales]
translation.zh: 我去去就回来

translation.en: -I'll be back as fast as I can. -[gasps]
translation.zh: 我会尽快回来

translation.en: [exhales] Don't panic. Keep calm and carry on.
translation.zh: 别紧张 冷静 坚持住

translation.en: [exhales] And run.
translation.zh: 然后开始逃之夭夭

translation.en: -[man 1] Check on that room! -They're coming. Take it.
translation.zh: -去检查那个房间 -他们来了 拿去

translation.en: What about you?
translation.zh: 那你怎么办？

translation.en: Just take it. Go. I'll distract them.
translation.zh: 赶紧拿去 我去引开他们

translation.en: [man 2] Hey! Over here!
translation.zh: 我在这边！

translation.en: [man 3 on comm] He's heading to the east stairway.
translation.zh: 他往东边的楼梯逃去了

translation.en: Alpha team to the east exit.
translation.zh: A队到东门拦截

translation.en: [inhales] Almost there.
translation.zh: 快到了

translation.en: [man 4] Your cape, Your Majesty.
translation.zh: 陛下 您的斗篷

translation.en: [chuckles] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: All right! Let's get the hell out of here!
translation.zh: 好了 赶紧离开这里

translation.en: Move it, Frank!
translation.zh: 弗兰克 快开车

translation.en: But Ms. Pembroke is not here!
translation.zh: 可是潘布洛克小姐还没回来

translation.en: It's everyone for themselves! Come on!
translation.zh: 人不为己 天诛地灭！ 快开车

translation.en: -[man yells indistinctly] -[Reggie whimpers]
translation.zh: 搜那边的车！

translation.en: Oh dear.
translation.zh: 糟糕

translation.en: Over here. Over… Stop! Come back here at once!
translation.zh: 我在这里 停车 马上给我回来！

translation.en: Frank!
translation.zh: 弗兰克！

translation.en: [laughs] That feels much better.
translation.zh: 感觉舒服多了

translation.en: [screams] You're all fired! Do you hear me?
translation.zh: 你们通通被开除了 听到了吗？

translation.en: No more free vacays and booze!
translation.zh: 我以后不会再带你们去免费度假 也不请你们喝酒了

translation.en: -Oh! What are you doing? -[Mindy groans]
translation.zh: 你搞什么鬼？

translation.en: Thank God.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地

translation.en: [Frank screams] Fear not, Ms. Pembroke!
translation.zh: 别怕 潘布洛克小姐

translation.en: -I will save you. -[man] Don't let them get away!
translation.zh: 我来救你了 别让他们逃跑了

translation.en: Ms. Pembroke, come with me if you want to live.
translation.zh: 潘布洛克小姐 想活命就跟我走

translation.en: [scoffs] Go!
translation.zh: 快开车

translation.en: -Right there! Right there! -Get it!
translation.zh: 在那边！

translation.en: -I'll call the police. -No.
translation.zh: -我去报警 -不用

translation.en: No police, idiot.
translation.zh: 不能报警 白痴

translation.en: And shut off that alarm.
translation.zh: 关掉警铃

translation.en: There you are. -We were so worried about you. -Zsst.
translation.zh: 你们回来了 我们很担心你们呢

translation.en: Explain.
translation.zh: 解释一下

translation.en: Well, Mother Superior called,
translation.zh: 院长打来说

translation.en: and your disciplinary meeting got pushed up,
translation.zh: 你的纪律听证会提早了

translation.en: so I had to be you.
translation.zh: 所以我只好假扮成你

translation.en: But never mind me. Are you guys okay?
translation.zh: 别理我了 你们都没事吧？

translation.en: Well, more or less. There was a bit of a hitch.
translation.zh: 还好吧 出了一点状况

translation.en: Peter had to stay behind to create a diversion.
translation.zh: 彼得必须留下来引开守卫

translation.en: But he was able to escape?
translation.zh: 但他逃得出来吧？

translation.en: Well, we still haven't heard from him, so we don't know.
translation.zh: 我们还没有他的消息 所以不清楚

translation.en: Well, did you get the Star?
translation.zh: 那你们弄到和平之星了吗？

translation.en: Of course we did, royal worrywart.
translation.zh: 当然了 少瞎操心了

translation.en: [Margaret] Uh, Fiona.
translation.zh: 菲欧娜

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: He switched it.
translation.zh: 被他掉包了

translation.en: Which means Peter has the Star.
translation.zh: 如今和平之星落在彼得手上了

translation.en: He fooled every one of us into thinking we could trust him.
translation.zh: 他骗了我们所有人 让我们相信他

translation.en: After everything we went through? I can't believe it.
translation.zh: 我们一起经历了这么多 他竟然骗了我们？真是难以置信

translation.en: [Margaret] Fiona.
translation.zh: 菲欧娜

translation.en: Fiona, you can't feel bad about this.
translation.zh: 菲欧娜 你不用为这件事自责

translation.en: Yeah, it really isn't your fault.
translation.zh: 真的不是你的错

translation.en: Well, then whose fault is it?
translation.zh: 那是谁的错呢？

translation.en: -We're back! Merry Chri-- -We're back!
translation.zh: -我们回来了 -我们回来了 圣诞…

translation.en: What the… Who the…
translation.zh: 这是…谁是…

translation.en: -Huh? -What's going on?
translation.zh: 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: I can explain everything.
translation.zh: 我可以解释的

translation.en: Which one are you?
translation.zh: 你哪位？

translation.en: It's okay, Kev. That's Margaret, not Fiona.
translation.zh: 凯文 没事的 那个是玛格丽特 不是菲欧娜

translation.en: -Stacy? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你是史黛西？ -对

translation.en: -And that's Margaret? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 哪个是玛格丽特？

translation.en: -Are you sure? -Let me prove it to you.
translation.zh: -你确定吗？ -我来证明给你看吧

translation.en: -No, no, no. -[Margaret] Shh.
translation.zh: 不用了

translation.en: [exhales] Okay. It's you.
translation.zh: 好吧 是你

translation.en: -Mm. -Phew. That was really strange.
translation.zh: 感觉怪怪的

translation.en: I guess we should call a press conference and let everyone know what's happened.
translation.zh: 看来我们应该召开记者会 公布和平之星失窃的消息了

translation.en: [Edward] I can see the headline now.
translation.zh: 我可以预想到新闻标题了

translation.en: "Saint Nicholas's Star of Peace gone forever."
translation.zh: “圣·尼古拉斯和平之星陨落”

translation.en: I suppose we should cancel everything.
translation.zh: 我认为我们应该取消所有活动

translation.en: The tree lighting, all of it.
translation.zh: 圣诞树亮灯礼什么的

translation.en: Well, first, let's start by informing Inspector Moretti and the cardinal.
translation.zh: 先知会莫拉蒂督察和主教吧

translation.en: They deserve to be prepared before all hell breaks loose.
translation.zh: 在事情尚未爆发前 应该让他们有所准备

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 是 殿下

translation.en: Oh, um, you should know the disciplinary committee waived the rest of your sentence.
translation.zh: 你知道纪委会 已经免除你剩余的刑责了吗？

translation.en: -What was that? -[Stacy] No more community service.
translation.zh: 怎么说？ 你不用再履行社会服务了

translation.en: You're done.
translation.zh: 你不用再服刑了

translation.en: [Reggie] You hear that, Fifi?
translation.zh: 菲菲 你听见了吗？

translation.en: You're as free as a bird.
translation.zh: 你像鸟儿一样自由了

translation.en: Even so, we're hoping you'll stay and spend the holidays with us.
translation.zh: 不过我们还是希望 你可以留下来共度佳节

translation.en: There's a noon flight to Capri tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明天中午有一班前往卡普里岛的航班

translation.en: We can make it if we leave after breakfast.
translation.zh: 吃过早餐后还来得及赶上航班

translation.en: [scoffs] Capri it is.
translation.zh: -我们就去卡普里岛吧 -太好了

translation.en: -Yes! -Joyeux Noel, mes amours.
translation.zh: 各位亲爱的 圣诞快乐

translation.en: -Hello, dear. -Hello. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -嗨 亲爱的 -嗨

translation.en: Mummy, Mummy, Mummy!
translation.zh: （曼德斯顿学院） -妈妈 -嗨

translation.en: [Mindy] Manderston Academy? What we doing here?
translation.zh: 曼德斯顿学院？来这里干吗？

translation.en: -[Reggie] Looks like a school to me. -[Mindy] Brilliant deduction, Sherlock.
translation.zh: 这地方看起来像一间学校 好精辟的推理 大侦探福尔摩斯

translation.en: [boy] Merry Christmas!
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐！

translation.en: I hated school. Skipped most of it.
translation.zh: 我最讨厌上学了 以前经常逃课

translation.en: That explains a lot.
translation.zh: 难怪了

translation.en: Hey, Fifi, where you going?
translation.zh: 菲菲 你要上哪儿去？

translation.en: -Stop talking. -[girl] Emily, I'm gonna miss you so much!
translation.zh: 闭嘴 -艾米丽 我会很想念你的 -我也是

translation.en: -Me too. Happy Holidays! -[girl] Bye! Have a great Christmas!
translation.zh: -艾米丽 我会很想念你的 -我也是 -佳节愉快 -再见 圣诞快乐

translation.en: Where's the Star, Peter?
translation.zh: 彼得 和平之星在哪里？

translation.en: I needed to get your attention.
translation.zh: 只有这么做才能引起你的注意

translation.en: [scoffs] I want the Star.
translation.zh: 交出和平之星

translation.en: And you'll get it.
translation.zh: 我一定会交还给你

translation.en: But in exchange, I need you to pop around to the dining hall.
translation.zh: 但作为交换条件 我要你前往餐室

translation.en: What on earth for?
translation.zh: 搞什么鬼？

translation.en: She wants to talk to you.
translation.zh: 她有话想跟你说

translation.en: How dare you tell me what to do?
translation.zh: 你凭什么管我？

translation.en: Someone has to, or you'll just go on living an empty, hollow life.
translation.zh: 总得有人拦住你 不然你会继续过着 空虚且毫无意义的人生

translation.en: [scoffs] So that's why you double-crossed me, to let me know I'm destined to be lonely and miserable?
translation.zh: 你骗我就是为了让我知道 我注定是个孤独绝望的人？

translation.en: More or less.
translation.zh: 可以这么说吧

translation.en: Do you want to give me what I came here for?
translation.zh: 你到底要不要把我要的东西交出来？

translation.en: Or shall I call the police and have you arrested?
translation.zh: 还是要我报警抓你？

translation.en: I know I said I'd always be there for you, Pemmie,
translation.zh: 小潘潘 虽然我说过我会永远在你身边

translation.en: but this is the end of the line for us.
translation.zh: 但我不能再这样下去了

translation.en: That's a relief.
translation.zh: 这就太好了

translation.en: Hello, Mummy.
translation.zh: 嗨 妈妈

translation.en: I didn't think you'd come.
translation.zh: 没想到你真来了

translation.en: I wasn't going to,
translation.zh: 我原本没打算来的

translation.en: but Peter said you wanted to speak to me, so go ahead.
translation.zh: 但彼得说你有话想跟我说

translation.en: Speak.
translation.zh: 说吧

translation.en: The apple doesn't fall far from the tree, does it?
translation.zh: 有其母必有其女 是吧？

translation.en: Is that what you've waited all these years to tell me?
translation.zh: 你等了这么多年 只为了跟我说这句话？

translation.en: Fiona darling, we can't go on like this.
translation.zh: 亲爱的菲欧娜 我们的关系不能再坏下去了

translation.en: Oh, I don't see why not.
translation.zh: 有何不可？

translation.en: You know, I've spent the last few years traveling the world
translation.zh: 过去几年以来 我周游各地

translation.en: trying to find some inner peace.
translation.zh: 企图寻找内心的平静

translation.en: Eat, Pray, Love. It's so last decade.
translation.zh: 就像《美食、祈祷和恋爱》中的情节 好过时

translation.en: [Bianca] That may be.
translation.zh: 或许吧

translation.en: But it was on a retreat at an ashram in Rishikesh
translation.zh: 瑞诗凯诗有个静修度假村

translation.en: that I finally realized that there has been a void in my life.
translation.zh: 我终于意识到 我的人生一直有个空洞

translation.en: Something missing.
translation.zh: 我总觉得缺了什么

translation.en: And it's my daughter.
translation.zh: 原来缺了我女儿

translation.en: Fiona. Fiona…
translation.zh: 菲欧娜

translation.en: I love you more than anything or anyone.
translation.zh: 我爱你胜过一切

translation.en: I always have.
translation.zh: 一直都是

translation.en: Do you have any idea what it was like
translation.zh: 你理解那种努力把自己变得够好

translation.en: trying to be good enough to be noticed by you? Trying to be good enough to matter to you?
translation.zh: 只为了引起你关注 以及让你重视我的感受吗？

translation.en: Better than you think.
translation.zh: 比你想象的还要理解

translation.en: Oh no, that is a lie.
translation.zh: 才怪 这是骗人的话

translation.en: You always had somewhere else you had to be.
translation.zh: 你总是有某个要去的目的地

translation.en: You always had a plane to catch.
translation.zh: 你总是赶飞机

translation.en: I was running away.
translation.zh: 我以前是为了逃避

translation.en: -[scoffs] -No, not from you.
translation.zh: 但逃避的对象不是你

translation.en: Never from you.
translation.zh: 从来都不是你

translation.en: Your father was…
translation.zh: 你父亲以前…

translation.en: Your father was cruel to me,
translation.zh: 你父亲以前对我很无情

translation.en: and rather than suffer it,
translation.zh: 我受不了

translation.en: I did whatever I could to get as far away from him as possible.
translation.zh: 所以竭尽所能地离他远远的

translation.en: Oh, so you're here to make excuses.
translation.zh: 你来就是为了找借口吗？

translation.en: No, there's… there's no excuse for what I did.
translation.zh: 不是 我的所作所为不值得原谅

translation.en: You're damned right there isn't.
translation.zh: 没错 你不值得原谅

translation.en: I've carried this around for years.
translation.zh: 这张卡片我一直带在身上

translation.en: Do you remember?
translation.zh: 你还记得吗？

translation.en: You gave it to me when you were ten. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 这是你十岁那年送给我的

translation.en: When I was here, I used to steal little trinkets,
translation.zh: 以前住在这里时 我经常偷些小饰品

translation.en: wrap them up so that on Christmas,
translation.zh: 把它们包扎起来 等圣诞节到了

translation.en: I could open them and pretend they were from you.
translation.zh: 我会拆开来 假装是你送来的礼物

translation.en: I loved you so much, and I tried.
translation.zh: 我很爱你 我很努力了

translation.en: I tried so hard not to care that I wasn't worthy of being loved back.
translation.zh: 我很努力地将自己不值得被爱的事实 抛诸脑后

translation.en: Oh, Fiona, you wonderful, perfect little girl. I…
translation.zh: 菲欧娜 -别过来 -你是妈妈美好无暇的女儿

translation.en: I was a wretched mother,
translation.zh: 我才是那个没用的妈妈

translation.en: and even though I don't deserve it,
translation.zh: 我知道我不配当你的妈妈

translation.en: I'm… I'm hoping that you can find it in your heart to forgive me.
translation.zh: 但我希望你能打从心里找到平安 然后原谅我

translation.en: Please, darling. Just give me a second chance.
translation.zh: 求你了 亲爱的 给妈妈一个机会吧

translation.en: Well, who knows how many Christmases we have left, you and I?
translation.zh: 谁知道我们还能一起过 多少个圣诞节呢？

translation.en: It's too late.
translation.zh: 太迟了

translation.en: [sobs] Fiona.
translation.zh: 菲欧娜

translation.en: ♪ You've been on my mind ♪ ♪ On my mind ♪
translation.zh: （妈妈 圣诞快乐 来自爱你的菲欧娜）

translation.en: Hey! Come on, Fifi!
translation.zh: 快点 菲欧娜

translation.en: We've got a plane to catch.
translation.zh: 我们还要赶飞机呢

translation.en: Fifi.
translation.zh: -菲菲 -怎么了？

translation.en: -What? -[Reggie] Where you going? Come back!
translation.zh: -菲菲 -怎么了？ 你要上哪儿去？回来！

translation.en: Come back! We've got a flight to catch!
translation.zh: 我们还要去赶飞机呢

translation.en: -[Reggie] What you doing? We've got to go! -Come back! We can't drive this!
translation.zh: -你搞什么？快没时间了！ -回来 这辆车我们开不动

translation.en: [Bianca] Oh, darling.
translation.zh: 亲爱的！

translation.en: Shh, shh. It's okay. It's okay. -♪ Home is where the love is ♪ -It's okay. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 没事了

translation.en: Hey, everything is gonna be okay. I promise.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 不会有事的 相信我

translation.en: Right this way, please.
translation.zh: 请往这边走

translation.en: Cardinal Amoah, Inspector Moretti,
translation.zh: 阿莫尔主教、莫拉蒂督察

translation.en: so good of you to come on such short notice.
translation.zh: 很高兴你们收到消息后马上赶来

translation.en: Your message said it was urgent.
translation.zh: 您留言说是急事

translation.en: [exhales] I'm feeling a little bit queasy.
translation.zh: 我感到有点头晕想吐

translation.en: Please take a seat.
translation.zh: 请坐

translation.en: I do hope everything is all right.
translation.zh: 希望一切安好

translation.en: -Um-- -It isn't all right. -[sighs] -It's fabulous, darling.
translation.zh: 何止安好 简直美翻了 亲爱的

translation.en: We gave the old thing a bit of a polish.
translation.zh: 我们把这个古董拿去打磨了一下

translation.en: I do hope you don't mind, Your Eminence.
translation.zh: 主教 希望您不会介意

translation.en: Mind? It looks spectacular. Gratias ago Deo.
translation.zh: 介意？和平之星看起来美仑美奂 感谢上帝

translation.en: Hm? Botticelli, Versace.
translation.zh: 波提切利 范思哲

translation.en: Aw, Auntie Bianca, what a pleasure to see you again.
translation.zh: 碧昂卡阿姨 很高兴再次见到你

translation.en: -Pleasure to be seen. -[chuckles] [chuckling] And who do we have here?
translation.zh: 我也是 这位是谁啊？

translation.en: Mummy, please.
translation.zh: 妈妈 差不多得了

translation.en: So, will the two of you be staying with us for Christmas?
translation.zh: 你们母女俩要留下来一起过圣诞吗？

translation.en: [exhales] Well, if it's all right with Maggie Moo.
translation.zh: 前提是小玛格不介意

translation.en: All right?
translation.zh: 怎么会介意呢？

translation.en: [scoffs] We'd be delighted to have you. You're family.
translation.zh: 我们很乐意跟你们共度圣诞 毕竟我们是一家人

translation.en: I suppose we are.
translation.zh: 我想是吧

translation.en: [Stacy] Um, Fiona?
translation.zh: 菲欧娜？

translation.en: I know you and I don't have that much in common,
translation.zh: 我知道我们俩志趣不同

translation.en: really anything in common.
translation.zh: 说真的 我们确实没有任何共同点

translation.en: I just want to say I'm really grateful for all you've done.
translation.zh: 但有些话不得不说 我很感激你所做的一切

translation.en: -You could have just disappeared. -Oh, I've actually given up disappearing.
translation.zh: 你原本可以一走了之的 我已经不想再闹失踪了

translation.en: Glad to hear it.
translation.zh: 那就好

translation.en: By the way, how did you convince Peter to give you back the Star?
translation.zh: 话说你是怎么说服彼得 把和平之星交还给你的？

translation.en: Oh yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊 怎么回事？

translation.en: He intended to, all along.
translation.zh: 他本来就没打算占为己有

translation.en: So does that mean he'll be joining us for Christmas?
translation.zh: 这是不是意味着 他也会跟我们一起过圣诞？

translation.en: Peter and I decided to go our separate ways.
translation.zh: 我和彼得决定各走各的了

translation.en: [Stacy] Oh no.
translation.zh: 真是的

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 真替你们感到惋惜

translation.en: Don't be. It's for the best.
translation.zh: 不用感到惋惜 这是最好的结果

translation.en: I think you need a hug.
translation.zh: 我觉得你需要一个拥抱

translation.en: Please, no.
translation.zh: 谢了 不用

translation.en: No… There it is.
translation.zh: 不要 你偏要 是吗？

translation.en: Hey, my family is from the Philippines. We do hugs.
translation.zh: 我家人来自菲律宾 抱抱是我们的习俗

translation.en: ♪ Up on the housetop, the reindeer pause ♪
translation.zh: 驯鹿停在屋顶上

translation.en: ♪ Out jumps good ol' Santa Claus ♪
translation.zh: 圣诞老人跳下来

translation.en: ♪ Down through the chimney With lots of toys ♪
translation.zh: 带着一堆礼物穿过烟囱

translation.en: ♪ All for the little ones Christmas joys ♪
translation.zh: 给小朋友带来专属于圣诞节的欢乐

translation.en: -♪ Ho, ho, ho! Who wouldn't go? ♪ -[woman yodels]
translation.zh: 谁不去啊？

translation.en: ♪ Ho, ho, ho! Who wouldn't go? ♪
translation.zh: 谁不去啊？

translation.en: ♪ Up on the housetop Click, click, click ♪
translation.zh: 在屋顶上叮叮当当踏步

translation.en: ♪ Down through the chimney With good Saint Nick ♪
translation.zh: 圣诞老人穿过烟囱

translation.en: After all we went through, it's a miracle this came together.
translation.zh: 我们经历了种种磨难 终究迎来了一个奇迹

translation.en: Ah, I knew it would.
translation.zh: 我并不感到意外

translation.en: You didn't tell me what happened to Hunter Cunard.
translation.zh: 你还没跟我说亨特·库纳的情况

translation.en: Oh, the police arrested him last night trying to flee the country.
translation.zh: 他昨晚企图逃出国 结果警察及时逮捕了他

translation.en: Guessing he's gonna spend a long time in jail.
translation.zh: 看来他将在监狱里待上好一阵子

translation.en: Well, deservedly so.
translation.zh: 那是他活该

translation.en: I gave them the diamond bracelet as well.
translation.zh: 我把钻石手链也交给警方了

translation.en: Did you happen to keep those red heels?
translation.zh: 那你有没有收下那双红色高跟鞋？

translation.en: Kevin!
translation.zh: 凯文！

translation.en: I couldn't be more proud of you and Queen Margaret, of course,
translation.zh: 我为你和玛格丽特女王感到骄傲

translation.en: for putting together a beautiful event like this.
translation.zh: 是你们促成了如此赏心悦目的活动

translation.en: Well, I couldn't have done it without you.
translation.zh: 没有你 我也办不到

translation.en: Well, I dare say we make a great team.
translation.zh: 都说我们是个默契十足的团队了

translation.en: Just like that dashing chap who dresses up like a bat
translation.zh: 就像那个把自己打扮成蝙蝠的帅哥

translation.en: and his, uh, beautiful catlike companion.
translation.zh: 以及他那个长得像猫的美女同伴

translation.en: [laughs] Babe, Batman and Catwoman aren't a team.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 蝙蝠侠和猫女不是同伙

translation.en: Of course they are.
translation.zh: 怎么可能？

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: [chuckles] Cheers, darling.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 干杯

translation.en: You know, this is the best Christmas I have ever had.
translation.zh: 这是我人生中最幸福的圣诞节

translation.en: Oh, because someone spiked the eggnog?
translation.zh: 因为你在蛋奶酒中加料吗？

translation.en: No, it's because I have my beautiful daughter back.
translation.zh: 不是 因为有我漂亮的女儿陪着我

translation.en: So, is this how it's going to be between us?
translation.zh: 我们真要这样下去吗？

translation.en: All gooey and sentimental?
translation.zh: 甜死人不偿命的？

translation.en: Mm-hmm. Oh yeah. Come here.
translation.zh: 对啊 抱一个

translation.en: Merry Christmas, darling.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 亲爱的

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Mummy.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 妈妈

translation.en: Love you.
translation.zh: 爱你哦

translation.en: Guru Adishankar, it's so lovely to see you.
translation.zh: 阿迪尚卡大师 很高兴见到你

translation.en: [laughing] I'm so happy!
translation.zh: 太开心了

translation.en: -I'm so glad we're together. -Oh my!
translation.zh: -很高兴我们一家团聚了 -天啊

translation.en: -Look at this guy! -[laughs]
translation.zh: 瞧瞧这个家伙

translation.en: You! You look bangin', bro.
translation.zh: 老兄 真有你的

translation.en: [Mindy] Well, hello, Mr. Handsome.
translation.zh: 嗨 大帅哥

translation.en: [Peter] Talk about clichés.
translation.zh: 这也太俗气了吧

translation.en: Beautiful woman, alone on Christmas, gazing up at the night sky.
translation.zh: 一个美女在圣诞夜里独自仰望天空

translation.en: Hm. I expected better from you.
translation.zh: 你的表现真是差强人意啊

translation.en: I didn't think I'd see you again.
translation.zh: 我没想到还会再见到你

translation.en: I was mad at you, Pemmie,
translation.zh: 小潘潘 我确实对你感到气馁

translation.en: because you didn't care about me as much as I cared about you.
translation.zh: 因为你在乎我的程度 不如我在乎你的程度

translation.en: And that's not a good reason to be mad at someone, so…
translation.zh: 即使如此 也不足以让我跟你置气

translation.en: so I came back to apologize.
translation.zh: 我回来向你道歉

translation.en: It's my turn to apologize.
translation.zh: 该轮到我向你道歉了

translation.en: You were right.
translation.zh: 你说得对

translation.en: I do shut people out. It's always felt safer that way.
translation.zh: 我把人拒之门外 只有这样我才感到安全

translation.en: But now?
translation.zh: 可是现在呢？

translation.en: It's what Mummy said.
translation.zh: 我妈妈说过

translation.en: We never know how much time we have left with the people we care about.
translation.zh: 我们永远都不知道 还能跟我们在乎的人共度多少时光

translation.en: [sighs] And we can't waste it.
translation.zh: 我们不能再浪费时间了

translation.en: Promise me you and I won't waste any more time.
translation.zh: 答应我 我们俩不要再浪费一分一秒了

translation.en: I promise.
translation.zh: 我答应你

translation.en: Swear.
translation.zh: 你发誓

translation.en: No matter what.
translation.zh: 无论何事…

translation.en: No matter where.
translation.zh: 何地

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen,
translation.zh: 各位先生女士

translation.en: before we light our tree,
translation.zh: 在我们点亮圣诞树前

translation.en: we just wanted to say how happy and grateful we are
translation.zh: 我们只想让你们知道 看到你们今晚出现

translation.en: that you all are here tonight.
translation.zh: 我们有多么开心和感恩

translation.en: And our greatest hope is that the Christmas spirit of goodwill and love
translation.zh: 我们最大的愿望是 圣诞节的友好和博爱精神

translation.en: fill the world and shine as brightly as the Star of Peace.
translation.zh: 能够充满全世界 就如和平之星的光芒般闪闪发亮

translation.en: So without further ado, Princess Olivia, will you do the honors?
translation.zh: 事不宜迟 奥利维亚公主 请你为我们主持亮灯仪式吧

translation.en: ♪ Deck the halls with boughs of holly ♪
translation.zh: 用冬青枝装饰厅堂
